alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Inland Citrus (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 7:21AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN CITRUS COUNTY THROUGH 745 AM EDT... At 721 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crystal River Airport, or 8 miles northwest of Homosassa Springs, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beverly Hills, Homosassa Springs, Crystal River Airport, Black Diamond, Inverness Highlands North, Homosassa, Hernando, Arbor Lakes, Citronelle, Crystal Manor, Crystal Oaks, River Lakes Manor, Citrus Springs, Pine Ridge, Citrus Hills, Brent Wood, and Lecanto. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM EDT for central and west central Florida.
